question:
[Judy] asked her sister [Ethel] if she wanted to go to the movies with her. [Ethel] said no, so [Judy] went with her brother [Kenneth] instead. [Charlie] enjoys going fishing with his brother. His name is [Gino]. [Janice] took her sister, [Michele], out to dinner for her birthday. [Michele] gave birth to a son named [Charlie]. [Judy] invited her brother [Kenneth] and her sister [Janice] over for dinner. [Jami] invited her brothers [Gino] and [Manuel] to her high school graduation.
Question: How is [Ethel] related to [Manuel]?
